Inspired by other open-source deep learning projects such as [`YOLO`](https://pjreddie.com/darknet/yolo/), [`ResNet`](https://arxiv.org/abs/1512.03385), and [`L5Kit`](https://github.com/woven-planet/l5kit), this project demonstrates object detection and motion prediction for autonomous vehicles using the **Kaggle Lyft motion prediction dataset**. We use **YOLOv5** for real-time object detection and **ResNet-50** for motion trajectory prediction.
